purpose: To receive personal responses to the information presented by B&W at the 1985 Maxwell Seminar.
comments: Completion of this brief questionnaire is appreciated. Signature is optional.

questions.question: The presentation clearly identified B&W's corporate strategy for the next 12 to 18 months.
Would you have need for BATUS and B.A.T.
Do you feel the answers to questions were responsive?
How do you rate B&W on company objectives?
